SELECT meeting.id, meeting.title, member.nickname as hostNickname, meeting.maxMember, meeting.createdAt, meeting.isClosed, meeting.deletedAt, Ifnull(pNum.num, 0) as participantsNum FROM meeting JOIN member ON meeting.regMemberId = member.id LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT meetingId, count(id) as num FROM participation GROUP BY meetingId ) AS pNum ON pNum.meetingId=meeting.id ORDER BY meeting.id DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size};
